content: betty s movie night mittens these mittens work up quickly and easily in worsted weight yarn the stranded patterns are simple you can knit while watching a movie or cheering on your favorite sports team use one 50 g skein of multi-colored yarn and small amounts of three solid colors have fun selecting the colors size women s medium yarn  color a solid for ribbed cuff and thumb approximately 50 yards  color b solid for striped cuff approximately 30 yards  color c multicolored for cuff hand and thumb contrast approximately 100 yards  color d solid for hand approximately 80 yards needles and gauge  cuff us size 3 3 25 mm double points or short circulars 11 stitches/2 inches  hand us size 5 3 75 mm double points or short circulars 13 stitches/2 inches  fingertip and thumb us size 5 3 75 mm double points 13 stitches/2 inches knitting instructions cuff  with smaller needles and color a cast on 42 stitches place marker at beginning of round  *knit 2 purl 1* ribbing around for 3 rounds  braid round adding color b bring both yarns to the front to purl  left mitten *purl 1 color a drop color a purl 1 color b over color a drop color b* around always bringing the next color over the previous color the braid will slant to the left  right mitten *purl 1 color a drop color a purl 1 color b under color a drop color b* around always bringing the next color under the previous color the braid will slant to the right  continuing with the cuff knit 1 round in color b  end color a add color c  knit in stranded stripe pattern around for 10 rounds *knit 1 color b knit 1 color c*  change to larger size needles  knit 1 round color b increasing one stitch knit 1 make 1 twice at the beginning and halfway through the round you now have 44 stitches pattern and images copyright 2016 betty j clay all rights reserved p 1 betty s movie night mittens page 2 hand  end color b add color d  beginning round with color d knit around in the checkerboard pattern for 16 rounds for afterthought thumb  left mitten knit around in checkerboard pattern to last 10 stitches of the round take a length of contrasting scrap yarn and knit 10 thumbhole stitches with it put those 10 stitches back on the left needle and finish the round in the checkboard pattern  right mitten knit the first 10 stitches of the round on a length of contrasting scrap yarn put those 10 stitches back on the left needle and knit the round in the checkboard pattern  knit 24 more rounds in checkerboard pattern for a total of 40 rounds in the checkerboard pattern hand decreases if using short circular needles switch to double pointed needles as needed
